am i still considered a virgin?

yesterday, my SO and i were constantly making out and he was fingering me throughout the day. we had never had actual intercourse (p in v)by the way. at one point he started eating me out, pulled away, and started fingering me again. when he took his fingers out there was blood all over them and i literally had tears in my eyes, i was so embarrassed 😭😭 he didnt seem to have a problem with it and was super supportive, but the real question is, if he broke my hymen, am i still a virgin just because it wasnt penetrated with a penis?

I had a miscarriage the 21 of Feb. I started bleeding the 13 (which I thought was my period). I was due for a period yesterday and today I woke up spotting (light red) and then 6+ hours later and NOTHING. What could this be? My stomach hurts, tired, I just feel awful. Possibility of pregnancy is possible.

Help me destroy my chances of having kids!!

Ok, I've decided that I am too dangerous of a person to be a mother. EVER!! I have awful anger issues that I cannot get over. I have already decided that I will be leaving my husband and family. I will be going far away to live on my own where I can't hurt anyone. But I would also like to destroy my ability to have children. I know that sounds strange, but trust me, it's for the best. I don't even want it to happen by mistake. I know I am not old enough to have my tubes tied yet. I know condoms and birth control, but they aren't 100% all the time. I need something that will make it impossible for me to have kids. Please give me ideas. I know I will get hate on this post, but I know that I am doing what's right.
And obviously don't have sex. But I want it 100% impossible. Even if say I am raped or something. I could never have an abortion and I get very attached very easily and it would be hard to give a baby away especially since I have wanted one for years. I plan on moving to a big city, so I want to completely make it impossible.
